gov.nih.nci.cabig.caaers.domain.repository
Class ResearchStaffRepository

java.lang.Object
  gov.nih.nci.cabig.caaers.domain.repository.ResearchStaffRepository

@Transactional(readOnly=true)
public class ResearchStaffRepository
extends java.lang.Object

This is the repository class for managing the research staff domain object.

Author:
Biju Joseph, Jared Flatow
